knimeNode.name: Microbial Data Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loads microbial data from a database

fullDescription.intro: The microbial data reader loads laboratory test data from a database, stored for example as bacterial cell counts (log10) per time (hours) for a specific test organism in a matrix with defined test conditions concerning temperature (temp), pH value (ph) and water activity (aw).
fullDescription.option: By default the internal database is accessed. This can be accessed and edited by clicking "PmmLab" -> "Open DB Gui...". In order to use an external database, check the box and choose another HSQL database. If necessary, a login and a password can also be entered. Please note: In order to be able to read the stored data the database should be structured in the same way as the internal database.
Check the box and enter the name of an organism.
Check the box and enter the name of a matrix.
